name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 018
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By And Carry On.  Keep Calm And Carry On was a wartime motivational poster produced during World War 2 in England.  In anticipation of mass air attacks on major cities it was meant to raise the public morale.  I decided upon using the phrase Please Stand By during the height of COVID because I felt people were so anxious to push things "back to normal" that their impatience was threatening humanity. Please Stand By And Carry On is a signal to show patience and persevere.  There is light at the end of the tunnel if we can follow the motto.
